io.github.rowak

Class Effect

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.rowak.Effect

  • public class Effect
extends java.lang.Object
    A local interface for an Aurora Effect. Setter methods in this class will not have an effect on the Aurora.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Effect.Color
      Represents a single color in an effect's palette.
      static class  Effect.Direction
      The available effect direction types.
      Note: If a direction is missing, please create an issue on Github.
      static class  Effect.Frame
      Stores an frame's RGBW color and transition time.
      static class  Effect.Type
      The availbale effect types.
      Note: The plugin type is for user-made plugin effect types.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Effect

        public Effect()

    • Method Detail

      • fromJSON

        public static Effect fromJSON(java.lang.String json)
        Parse the Effect data from the raw JSON data into a new Effect object.
        Parameters:
        json - the JSON data to convert
        Returns:
        a new Effect equivalent to the JSON data

      • toJSON

        public java.lang.String toJSON(java.lang.String writeCommand)
        Properly convert an effect object to JSON format. This method is most likely used in combination with the Aurora.Effects.writeEffect(String) method, to upload a local Effect to the Aurora.
        Parameters:
        writeCommand - the command prepended to the JSON data to prepare it for the Aurora.addEffect() method. Set to null to not add a write command to the JSON data
        Returns:
        the Effect in JSON format

      • createStaticEffect

        public static Effect createStaticEffect(java.lang.String effectName,
                                        Aurora.Panel[] panels,
                                        Aurora controller)
                                 throws StatusCodeException,
                                        StatusCodeException.UnauthorizedException,
                                        StatusCodeException.UnprocessableEntityException
        Creates a new static-type Effect. Each panel can be individually set to the desired color.
        Parameters:
        effectName - the desired name of the new effect
        panels - the configured panels of the aurora. Each panel must have the RGBW values set in order for the change to take effect
        controller - the desired Aurora controller object
        Returns:
        a new static-type Effect
        Throws:
        StatusCodeException.UnauthorizedException - if the access token is invalid
        StatusCodeException.UnprocessableEntityException - if panels is malformed
        StatusCodeException

      • createStaticEffect

        public static Effect createStaticEffect(java.lang.String effectName,
                                        java.lang.String animData)
        Creates a new static-type Effect using previously created animation data.
        Parameters:
        effectName - the desired name of the new effect
        animData - the desired animation data
        Returns:
        a new static-type Effect

      • createCustomEffect

        public static Effect createCustomEffect(java.lang.String effectName,
                                        java.lang.String animData,
                                        boolean loop)
        Creates a new custom-type Effect. Animation data must be created without the API. Refer to the OpenAPI documentation (section 3.4.2) for more information.
        Parameters:
        effectName - the desired name of the new effect
        animData - the animation data for the effect
        loop - whether the effect should loop or not
        Returns:
        a new custom-type Effect
